events.name: Russian rocket attack on Chasiv Yar
events.wd_label: Russian rocket attack on Chasiv Yar
events.wd_description: A Russian rocket hit the town of Chasiv Yar in Eastern Ukraine, destroying a five-story apartment building and killing at least six people.
events.description: A Russian rocket hit the town of Chasiv Yar in Eastern Ukraine, destroying a five-story apartment building and killing at least six people.

events.name: rocket attack
events.wd_description: The town of Chasiv Yar was hit by Uragan rockets from truck-borne systems, launched by Russian forces.
events.description: The town of Chasiv Yar was hit by Uragan rockets from truck-borne systems, launched by Russian forces.

events.name: impact on Chasiv Yar
events.wd_description: The rocket attack destroyed a five-story apartment building in Chasiv Yar, resulting in at least six deaths.
events.description: The rocket attack destroyed a five-story apartment building in Chasiv Yar, resulting in at least six deaths.

events.name: regional context
events.wd_description: Chasiv Yar, located in the Donetsk region, is expected to be an essential target for Russian forces as they advance westward; the Donetsk and Luhansk regions make up the Donbas area, a focal point of conflict since 2014.
events.description: Chasiv Yar, located in the Donetsk region, is expected to be an essential target for Russian forces as they advance westward; the Donetsk and Luhansk regions make up the Donbas area, a focal point of conflict since 2014.

events.name: School shooting in Izhevsk, Russia
events.wd_description: A gunman opened fire at a school in Izhevsk, central Russia, killing at least 15 people and injuring 24, including 11 children. The gunman, a former student of the school, killed himself at the scene.
events.description: A gunman opened fire at a school in Izhevsk, central Russia, killing at least 15 people and injuring 24, including 11 children. The gunman, a former student of the school, killed himself at the scene.

events.name: casualties
events.wd_description: Eleven children and four adults, including two security guards and two teachers, were killed in the shooting, and 24 others were injured, with only two of them not being children.
events.description: Eleven children and four adults, including two security guards and two teachers, were killed in the shooting, and 24 others were injured, with only two of them not being children.

events.name: panic inside the school
events.wd_description: Video footage showed panic inside the building, with children and adults running along the corridors and blood seen on the floor of a classroom, with children crouching underneath desks.
events.description: Video footage showed panic inside the building, with children and adults running along the corridors and blood seen on the floor of a classroom, with children crouching underneath desks.

events.name: details of the incident
events.wd_description: The gunman, a former student of the school, opened fire at the school with about 1,000 pupils in the city of Izhevsk and then killed himself at the scene.
events.description: The gunman, a former student of the school, opened fire at the school with about 1,000 pupils in the city of Izhevsk and then killed himself at the scene.

events.name: Nancy Pelosi's visit to Taiwan
events.wd_description: US House Speaker Nancy Pelosi visited Taiwan, marking the most senior US politician visit in 25 years, prompting strong reactions from China.
events.description: US House Speaker Nancy Pelosi visited Taiwan, marking the most senior US politician visit in 25 years, prompting strong reactions from China.

events.name: Pelosi's visit
events.wd_description: Nancy Pelosi, the most senior US politician to visit Taiwan in 25 years, met with leaders in Taipei's capital.
events.description: Nancy Pelosi, the most senior US politician to visit Taiwan in 25 years, met with leaders in Taipei's capital.

events.name: Chinese government's response
events.wd_description: The Chinese government accused the United States of violating China’s sovereignty under the guise of democracy, with Foreign Minister Wang Yi issuing a warning.
events.description: The Chinese government accused the United States of violating China’s sovereignty under the guise of democracy, with Foreign Minister Wang Yi issuing a warning.

events.name: Pelosi's statement
events.wd_description: Nancy Pelosi stated that China cannot prevent world leaders from traveling to Taiwan to respect its democracy, highlight its successes, and reaffirm commitment to collaboration.
events.description: Nancy Pelosi stated that China cannot prevent world leaders from traveling to Taiwan to respect its democracy, highlight its successes, and reaffirm commitment to collaboration.

events.name: Biden's disapproval
events.wd_description: President Joe Biden, Pelosi's party colleague, did not approve of her visit, stating that the American military felt it was "not a good idea right now" due to high tensions with China.
events.description: President Joe Biden, Pelosi's party colleague, did not approve of her visit, stating that the American military felt it was "not a good idea right now" due to high tensions with China.

events.name: Volkswagen's EV battery supply chain strategy
events.wd_label: Volkswagen's EV battery supply chain strategy
events.wd_description: Volkswagen is investing $20.38 billion to build electric vehicle batteries, creating 20,000 jobs and generating $20.38 billion in annual sales through its new company, Power Co.
events.description: Volkswagen is investing $20.38 billion to build electric vehicle batteries, creating 20,000 jobs and generating $20.38 billion in annual sales through its new company, Power Co.

events.name: establishment of Power Co
events.wd_description: Volkswagen has created a new company, Power Co, to oversee its entire battery supply chain, from R&D to raw material mining and recycling.
events.description: Volkswagen has created a new company, Power Co, to oversee its entire battery supply chain, from R&D to raw material mining and recycling.

events.name: battery production plants
events.wd_description: Power Co will manage the construction of six battery cell production plants in Europe by 2030, including plants in Germany, Sweden, Spain, and Eastern Europe, with plans for gigafactories in North America.
events.description: Power Co will manage the construction of six battery cell production plants in Europe by 2030, including plants in Germany, Sweden, Spain, and Eastern Europe, with plans for gigafactories in North America.

events.name: t: Salzgitter plant
events.wd_description: Volkswagen has begun construction on its first battery plant in Salzgitter, Germany.
events.description: Volkswagen has begun construction on its first battery plant in Salzgitter, Germany.

events.name: t: Skelleftea plant
events.wd_description: Volkswagen is building a battery production plant in Skelleftea, Sweden.
events.description: Volkswagen is building a battery production plant in Skelleftea, Sweden.

events.name: t: Valencia plant
events.wd_description: Volkswagen will establish a battery production plant in Valencia, Spain.
events.description: Volkswagen will establish a battery production plant in Valencia, Spain.

events.name: t: Eastern Europe plant
events.wd_description: Volkswagen plans to build a battery production plant in Eastern Europe.
events.description: Volkswagen plans to build a battery production plant in Eastern Europe.

events.name: t: North America gigafactories
events.wd_description: Volkswagen is exploring plans to build future gigafactories in North America.
events.description: Volkswagen is exploring plans to build future gigafactories in North America.

events.name: unified prismatic cell design
events.wd_description: Starting in 2023, Volkswagen will roll out a new unified prismatic cell design for its batteries, aiming to power 80% of its electric vehicles by 2030.
events.description: Starting in 2023, Volkswagen will roll out a new unified prismatic cell design for its batteries, aiming to power 80% of its electric vehicles by 2030.

events.name: partnerships and investments
events.wd_description: Volkswagen has contracts with major battery producers Samsung and CATL, and is investing in QuantumScape, a startup working on solid-state batteries.
events.description: Volkswagen has contracts with major battery producers Samsung and CATL, and is investing in QuantumScape, a startup working on solid-state batteries.

events.name: t: partnerships with Samsung and CATL
events.wd_label: t: partnerships with Samsung and CATL
events.wd_description: Volkswagen has established contracts with Samsung and CATL for battery production.
events.description: Volkswagen has established contracts with Samsung and CATL for battery production.

events.name: t: investment in QuantumScape
events.wd_description: Volkswagen is backing QuantumScape, a startup based in San Jose, California, that is developing energy-efficient solid-state batteries.
events.description: Volkswagen is backing QuantumScape, a startup based in San Jose, California, that is developing energy-efficient solid-state batteries.
